TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {1=Currently, as of Eclipse Juno SR2 (1 March 2012), the Eclipse for Parallel Application Developers contains PTP 6.0.4. We suggest you install this and update from the PTP-specific update site http://download.eclipse.org/tools/ptp/updates/juno will get you the latest PTP (6.0.5).}
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {9825=This release of PTP is 6.0.5, released March 15, 2013 which works with Eclipse Juno SR2 (4.2.2)., 21951=Copyright © 2015 The Eclipse Foundation. All Rights Reserved.}
textBeforeTable: The RDT server components are required if you are using the Remote System Explorer (RSE) as a remote service provider for RDT. If you are using Remote Tools (installed as part of PTP) the server components are installed automatically. See the release notes for more details on using RSE with RDT. Optional Remote Development Tools (RDT) Server Components ptp-proxy-6.0.5.zip Server components for the (original proxy-based) IBM LoadLeveler, IBM PE, and SLURM resource managers, and the parallel debugger, need to be built and installed from source code. The following download link will work for the 6.0.5 versions of PTP. See the release notes for instructions on installing the optional PTP server components. Note this is ONLY required if you want to use the older legacy proxy-based run configurations, or you want to use the PTP parallel debugger. See Instructions for building sdm for the parallel debugger in the release notes. Optional PTP Server Components ptp-master-6.0.5-201303141511.zip Archived update site (You asked for it!) can be downloaded from: Archived Update Site Other PTP builds are also available from the PTP builds page. --> PTP releases automatically. the PTP-specific update site; this gets the most recent update (or re-install the current release from there) and then Help > Check for Updates will find subsequent to install PTP on top of that from follow the instructions for Updating from from the
textAfterTable: Previous releases Download information for PTP 5.0 for Eclipse 3.7 (Indigo). PTP 4.0 was released for Eclipse 3.6 (Helios). PTP 3.0 was released for Eclipse 3.5 (Galileo). PTP 2.1 was released for Eclipse 3.4 (Ganymede). Fortran Development Tools (Photran) Photran is now part of PTP and can be installed using the PTP update site.
